name: Going Down in Fishstory
description:
A short underwater adventure made for Ludum Dare 48 in under 72 hours.

Story

You are a globefish named Bubblyn, on your way to the breeding grounds with your partner Booba and your friend Joefish the blowfish. However, there has been an oil spill that’s blocking your usual path down to the bottom of the ocean. The alternate route holds many unforseen dangers. Will everyone make it down in one piece?

Credits

Made by Blackthornprod, Jonas Tyroller, Yän with some additional voice acting by Klara Tyroller.
